content.p: As the parent or guardian of a young person applying to university for the first time, here are some of the things you may be curious about or need to consider. These pages include information for parents, guardians, carers, family members or anybody helping a student to apply. Our 2024 open days will take place on: They will include a talk for parents and carers, as well as a range of other talks, campus tours and more. Find out more and register your interest If you can't attend an open day, you may wish to book a campus tour or attend one of our virtual events. Find out more about your options for visiting us. Alternatively, we have a variety of of ways to connect with us online. You can: Our site makes use of cookies. See Cookies for details.
